meanings.sent1: She wore geeky glasses to the comic convention.
meanings.sent2: The geeky group discussed their favorite sci-fi movies.
meanings.sent3: His geeky shirt had a funny alien design.
meanings.sent4: The geeky atmosphere at the tech conference was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The geeky trivia night was a hit with the attendees.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a nerdy or socially awkward manner
meanings.sent1: He felt geeky when he stumbled over his words in front of his crush.
meanings.sent2: The geeky student blushed when called to the board.
meanings.sent3: Her geeky dance moves made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The geeky way he avoided eye contact was endearing.
meanings.sent5: The geeky laugh that followed his joke was contagious.

meanings.definition: Showing excessive enthusiasm or knowledge about a particular subject
meanings.sent1: She had a geeky passion for collecting vintage stamps.
meanings.sent2: The geeky fan knew every detail about the band's history.
meanings.sent3: His geeky excitement for the new video game was infectious.
meanings.sent4: The geeky level of detail in her presentation impressed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The geeky dedication to his hobby was truly admirable.
